thread.title: RUMOURS: Arsenal, Everton & Monaco battle for Lyon winger
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Arsenal, Everton & Monaco battle for Lyon winger

title: RUMOURS: Arsenal, Everton & Monaco battle for Lyon winger
text:
0 20 Jan 2017 19:30:36 The Ligue 1 side are the latest to have thrown their hat into the ring for the Algerian, whose contract is up at the end of the season 
AS Monaco have joined Arsenal, Everton, Napoli and several others in the race to sign Lyon winger Rachid Ghezzal, talkSPORT reports. 
Ghezzal, an Algeria international, is out of contract with the Ligue 1 side in the summer and refuses to sign an extension with Memphis Depay's new club. 
Monaco, the latest to register their interest in the 24-year-old, are confident they can persuade Ghezzal to stay in France, but offers from Serie A and the Premier League are sure to give the player food for thought.
